website_summaries.verdict: One of the most affordable options for cat jerky treats that still is mostly meat.
pros: Treats are individually wrapped to keep them fresh and can be broken into smaller pieces
Ingredients are 90% meat and contain no artificial flavors, corn, wheat, or soy
Most cats love them and they're great for cats that chew on things around the house
cons: They do contain sugar, so not ideal for those trying to avoid all sugar for their cats

customer_reviews.title: Will have your cat crawling over you to get
customer_reviews.text: As a peace offering to my Momr's cat on a weekend visit I picked these up. The cat absolutely loved them. Was crawling all over me when I'd grab for one. Both the duck and salmon worked wonders. They can easily be broken into smaller bits too if you want to save some for later. Funny story is after I left, the cat found one in it's wrapper and worked his way through it to get the jerky while everyone was asleep. You might want to hide them in a drawer. This isn't a cat that typically goes crazy for food so these must have made quite an impression.
customer_reviews.author: S.T

customer_reviews.title: Three Cats Love These Treats
customer_reviews.text: We have a Friskies Pull N Play for out cats. One of the three loved the "strings" that went into the ears the the wobbly cat. Friskies stopped making them and Rocky just looked at my husband in confusion when the strings were missing. These need to be cut inhalf lengthwise to fit the ears, but Rocky is happy with his Pull N Play again. The other two cats don't get a chance at the ears, but enjoy the treats separately.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: My cat absolutely loves these
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes wild for these. I keep a few in a holder by my chair and he sits on my lap and stares at them. If that does notbwork he will then tap on my arm then the container until he gets one. He is a big sturdy boy and I don't have to break them up. He just bites off pieces. If hungry he can finish off one is 30 seconds or less. They satisfy him and have less calories than the amount of dried treats he would have to eat to be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: V. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Love them - but use caution
customer_reviews.text: The cats love these. I wanted something that they could work at chewing. They needed something to take them away from chewing electrical cords. These are not that chewy. I put one down for kitty and left the room. Five minutes later I came back and there was only an inch left. Now I cut them into little pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth N.

customer_reviews.title: I like to break the "sticks" of Duck Jerky Treat for ...
customer_reviews.text: Annie (one of my cats) LOVES the treats! I like to break the "sticks" of Duck Jerky Treat for Cats into small pieces for her to eat out of my hand. She gobbles them down like she'd hadn't had anything to eat all day. She looks around to see if there is more. I don't generally let her have more than one stick at a time so she'll eat her regular food.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey _Mouse

customer_reviews.title: My cat goes wild for these
customer_reviews.text: Most of my cats love these and a few just cannot figure out how to eat them. For the ones that love these, they just see the wrapper and get excited.
customer_reviews.author: Dana J. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Price went up... $4 is too much!! Sorry
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes these very much. They were cheaper when I bought them. Now they increased price. My car is super picky. They have some other ones cheaper and she loves them too! I will buy what is the most affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Ku'ulei

customer_reviews.title: tastes like health food with a bit of take out aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: Only treat my scaredy cat will go full Hulk on the other cats for... to find why I tried one...tastes like health food with a bit of take out aftertaste...would eat again if I wasn't scared the cat would eat me for taking her treats.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Osis of Liver

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. I used to get the hem in Ealmart for $1.98 a package, do I am not too happy paying $4.99 a package. But this is the only place o can find the them now. Ealmart does not carry them anymore. Other than the price, 2 of my cats go absolutely crazy for these great sticks
customer_reviews.author: Lesley McCrory

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: My cat is pretty fussy about what she'll eat...but she gobbles these up so they must have her stamp of approval!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Care for my cat
customer_reviews.text: This had pork and a lot of other ingredients. This was not as advertised and I cannot return it
customer_reviews.author: greeneyes

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES his "beef stick" every morning...
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES his "beef stick" every morning before I leave for work. I try to only feet him things that are mostly meat product. HE ABSOLUTELY GOES NUTS FOR THESE. But I hate that they have ingredients like sugar and salt... like why?
customer_reviews.author: ArgyleTrekkie

customer_reviews.title: My cat highly recommends
customer_reviews.text: Idk what's in these but my cat spends half of her day trying to open the cabinet where I keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Truthsayer

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this
customer_reviews.text: Want your cats to fight? Break out this treat. I have to sit between the 2 so they both get to enjoy the treat.
customer_reviews.author: Candie_gurl7

customer_reviews.title: All the cats love them but they have to be kept locked up ...
customer_reviews.text: All the cats love them but they have to be kept locked up or the fatty thieves will steal them!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Cats beg for them
customer_reviews.text: My cats love them and they will beg for them if they see I have more in the pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats loved these, even the picky eater. They make great treats.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sersif

customer_reviews.title: Kitty absolutely loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were a bit cheaper because my Kitty really loves these snacks.
customer_reviews.author: D. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Not my cats type
customer_reviews.text: on sale For $1.71 I couldn't pass it up, but I just wish my cat would eat it! I have to break it into pieces and mix it in his food. I think he's more of a seafood type though.
customer_reviews.author: Katelin

customer_reviews.title: I can only review from my cat's stance. He ...
customer_reviews.text: I can only review from my cat's stance. He loves the Sheba sticks. Not so fond of these. Will eat them reluctantly if no Sheba stick is procured in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Crane

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Treats were very solid compared to when I buy them on another site. Cats didnt even want to eat them and these are normally their favorite
customer_reviews.author: Garrett & Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: My cat says YUM!
customer_reviews.text: A little more expensive than other flavors, but my cat is obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Popular with the kitty!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these treats! So far all of the flavors have been a hit.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves them!!!! He goes crazy when he hears me opening the ziplock bag I store them in. Have already bought more. Great price😎
customer_reviews.author: TSO

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not one of my 2 cats and 1 kitten like this. They had absolutely NO interest.
customer_reviews.author: Leacy

customer_reviews.title: My cats are obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Got these in my KitNipBox last month and my cats went insane. Found them here, in the duck flavor, and bought them. My cats gobbled them up just as much as the salmon ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cats love them but after first order price went up drastically
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: 100% Cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: My boys are very picky! They LOVE these Jerky Treats & expect one each morning- I purchased this brand because the brand I was using stopped making Jerky Treats! Crisis until I discovered the Prime Treats!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: my cat loves these things. I used to give ...
customer_reviews.text: my cat loves these things. I used to give him half a stick so he could chase it around and play with it a little, but he wolfed them down so quickly I had to break it into smaller pieces so it didn't disappear immediately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something different to offer as a treat.
customer_reviews.text: My cat ate them at first then decided he didn't like them.
customer_reviews.author: Pookey62521

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Cat says these are tasty and wants more, more, more! Can't refuse. :(
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: u
customer_reviews.text: Ocicat goes bonkers for these and I love the meat content. Wish my Siamese were so inclined, but each cat is unique.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koller

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but cats will not eat. They smell and walk away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these things
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these things! They eat the bits as fast as I put them down. The bits are soft so also good for my older cat.
customer_reviews.author: sbeav

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Our cat literally stands up for these treats. Can be broken into bite sized.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It smells good to me! but my two cats are reluctant to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: except not horrible for her
customer_reviews.text: My cat adores these treats, I always said they should make slim jims for cats, and these are basically that, except not horrible for her. They have little notches where you can break them up into smaller pieces, but I prefer to just let my cat eat a whole stick, just only once or twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Xenophero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our fur babies just go crazy over these. They are their favorites!!
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Great treats for cats!
customer_reviews.text: My Cat loves these treats. He will stand up on his back legs and reach for them with his front paws. It's adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Lana M Howard

product_meta.title: Prime Taste Treats Duck Jerky Treat For Cats, 35G
product_meta.description: Prime Taste Treats are a terrific way to reward the fabulous felines in your life! Each packet contains 7 individually wrapped treats (7x5g sticks) that are meant to be broken into smaller pieces.
feature_bullets: No Wheat, No Soybeans, No Corn
